dirt_scattered.description: Scattered brown dirt and rock fragments for exterior ground texture.

dirt_rocky.description: A patch of dirt with scattered rocks and debris for exterior ground texture.

dirt_dense.description: A compact patch of dark brown dirt and stone fragments clustered together for exterior ground texture.

dirt_stony.description: A heavily fragmented dirt surface with numerous dark stone chunks and rocky protrusions for exterior ground texture.

grass_scattered.description: Sparse green grass and vegetation strands scattered thinly across bare ground for exterior terrain.

grass_dense.description: Dense clusters of small green vegetation patches scattered across bare ground for exterior terrain.

grass_sparse.description: Scattered small green grass fragments and vegetation tufts sparsely distributed across bare ground for exterior terrain.

railroad_tracks.description: Vertical railroad tracks with white wooden ties laid across a maroon ground surface for outdoor pathways.

railroad_corner.description: An outer L-shaped corner of railroad tracks with white ties and maroon ground for pathway intersections.

railroad_tjunction.description: A T-shaped railroad track intersection with white ties and maroon ground for three-way pathway junctions.

railroad_crossing.description: A four-way railroad track intersection with white ties and maroon ground for crossing pathways.

railroad_end.description: A U-shaped railroad track terminus with white ties and maroon ground for dead-end pathways.

wall_border_vertical_edge.description: A thin vertical maroon line forming a wall edge or boundary on a light background.

wall_border_inner_corner.description: An inner right-angle corner of a maroon wall forming a recessed junction on a light background.

wall_border_outer_corner.description: An outer corner of a maroon wall forming a protruding junction on a light background.

floor_border_pattern.description: A decorative maroon floor tile with rectangular blocks arranged in an ornamental grid pattern on a light background.

floor_checkerboard_pattern.description: A maroon checkerboard-patterned floor tile with alternating blocks on a light background.

stone_wall_corner_top_left.description: A light stone wall tile with rectangular block patterns forming the top-left corner piece of a defensive or decorative stone wall structure.

stone_wall_top_middle.description: A light stone wall tile with rectangular block patterns forming the top-middle edge piece of a stone wall structure.

stone_wall_corner_top_right.description: A light stone wall tile with rectangular block patterns forming the top-right corner piece of a stone wall structure.

wood_ladder_top.description: Top of a wooden ladder with two vertical rails and horizontal rungs for vertical climbing.

spike_trap_spikes.description: Jagged tan spikes protruding upward from a spike trap hazard tile.

exclamation_mark_icon.description: A decorative UI icon featuring a centered cross with small square ornaments at each corner, resembling a stylized exclamation mark symbol.

robed_human.description: A standing human figure wearing a long robe or cloak, depicted in pixel art form.

human_standing_simple.description: A minimalist beige human figure with a small square head, white pixel eyes, and a large rectangular body in a neutral standing pose.

human_warrior_spear.description: A standing human warrior wielding a spear or polearm weapon in a ready stance.

human_warrior_sword_shield.description: A standing human warrior wielding a sword in one hand and a shield in the other, in a combat-ready stance.

armored_warrior_sword_shield.description: A standing armored warrior wielding a sword and shield in combat-ready stance.

armored_warrior_spear_shield.description: A standing armored warrior wielding a spear and shield in combat-ready stance.

armored_warrior.description: A standing armored warrior in a neutral pose with distinctive squared shoulders and helmet, depicted without weapons or shield.

armored_warrior_horns_sword.description: A standing armored warrior with a horned helmet wielding a sword and shield in combat-ready stance.

helmet_1.description: A basic horned helmet with a distinctive mushroom-like cap and wide brim design.

helmet_2.description: A flat-topped helmet with a wide rectangular eye opening and protective side plates, designed as headgear for warrior equipment.

helmet_3.description: A rounded-top helmet with a wide eye opening and protective side plates, featuring a distinct mushroom-like crown design.

helmet_4.description: A wide-brimmed helmet with a distinctive T-shaped eye opening and protective design.

helmet_5.description: A spiked helmet with a distinctive cross-shaped eye opening and protective side design.

space_helmet.description: A rounded futuristic space helmet with a distinctive dome design and large visor opening.

helmet_6.description: A flat-crowned army-style helmet with a wide brim and protective side plates, featuring a utilitarian military design.

wings_1.description: A pair of feathered angel wings spread outward as equipment or decorative armor piece.

wings_2.description: A pair of angular, pointed wings spread outward as equipment or decorative armor piece.

gauntlets_white_1.description: A pair of white-colored protective gauntlets or hand armor pieces.

gauntlets_white_2.description: A pair of white-colored protective gauntlets with a structured, blocky design.

car_white_1.description: A white four-wheeled car viewed from the side, with a boxy rectangular body and defined wheels.

car_white_2.description: A white four-wheeled car viewed from the side with a compact, rounded body shape and distinct wheel details.

car_white_3.description: A white four-wheeled truck or van viewed from the side with an angular, boxy body design.

car_white_topdown_1.description: A white four-wheeled car viewed from above with a rectangular body and white-outlined wheels.

rocket_1.description: A vertical rocket with a pointed nose cone, main fuselage, and side fins.

wheelchair_1.description: A wheelchair viewed from the side with visible wheels and seat structure.

tree_green_1.description: A bright green coniferous tree with a pyramidal shape and thin trunk.

tree_green_segmented_1.description: A tiered green tree with distinct horizontal striations across its foliage, giving a stylized decorative appearance.

tree_green_rounded_1.description: A bright green tree with a full, rounded canopy and thin rectangular trunk.

tree_green_clustered_1.description: A bright green tree with two rounded foliage clusters separated by a thin trunk section.

tree_green_wide_1.description: A bright green tree with a wide, rounded canopy and thin trunk base.

tree_green_trunk_1.description: A bright green tree with a wide rounded canopy and a thin vertical trunk.

cactus_green_1.description: A bright green cactus with segmented vertical body and multiple protruding arms.

cactus_green_paired_1.description: Two bright green cacti standing side by side with segmented vertical bodies and multiple protruding arms.

dirt_road_patched_1.description: A brown dirt road with scattered light patches of exposed underlying terrain running vertically down the outsides of the tile

dirt_road_corner_1.description: A dark brown dirt road corner piece with light patches and jagged edges forming an L-shaped intersection.

dirt_road_tjunction_1.description: A dark brown dirt road forming a T-junction with three-way intersection connecting top, left, and bottom paths.

dirt_road_intersection_4way.description: A dark brown dirt road forming a four-way intersection with paths connecting all cardinal directions and light patches throughout.

dirt_road_dead_end_1.description: A dark brown dirt road with light patches that terminates three-quarters of the way up the tile, extending from the bottom.

stepping_stone_vertical.description: Three brown stepping stones arranged vertically, forming a dashed line pattern across the tile.

stepping_stone_corner_1.description: Brown stepping stones arranged in an L-shaped corner pattern.

stepping_stone_tjunction_1.description: Brown stepping stones arranged in a T-junction pattern with three paths connecting top, left, and right directions.

stepping_stone_cross.description: Brown stepping stones arranged in a plus-shaped cross pattern forming a four-way junction.

stepping_stone_pair.description: Two parallel brown stepping stones arranged vertically to form a dual-path junction.

stone_wall_left_middle.description: A stone wall section positioned on the left side of the tile, forming the middle portion of a wall structure.

stone_rubble_sparse.description: Scattered fragments of broken stone bricks creating a sparse rubble pattern.

stone_wall_right_middle.description: A stone wall section positioned on the right side of the tile, forming the middle portion of a wall structure.

ladder_base.description: The bottom section of a wooden ladder with four horizontal rungs and vertical side rails, designed to connect with the ladder top above it.

scaffolding_middle.description: Wooden scaffolding structure with vertical supports and horizontal cross-bracing forming the middle section of a construction frame.

exclamation_point_filled.description: A solid-filled exclamation point icon contained within a bordered square frame.

robed_mage_staff.description: A robed human character holding a magical staff, depicted in pixel art form.

human_farmer.description: A pixel art farmer character wearing work clothes and a wide-brimmed hat, standing in a neutral pose.

human_femme.description: A female-looking human character in pixel art form, depicted in a neutral standing pose.

human_vest.description: A pixel art human character wearing a brown vest over a light-colored shirt, standing in a neutral pose.

human_sash.description: A pixel art human character wearing a distinctive sash or draped garment across their torso.

undead_zombie.description: A pixel art zombie creature with a hollow, decomposed face and tattered appearance, representing an undead character.

undead_robed.description: A skeletal undead character with a skull face wearing robes, depicted in a standing pose with outstretched limbs.

undead_robed_staff.description: A skeletal undead character with a skull face wearing robes and wielding a magical staff.

breastplate_sleeveless.description: A torso armor piece with shoulder protection but no arm coverage, designed for maximum mobility.

breastplate_pauldrons.description: A torso armor piece with large shoulder pauldrons and central chest protection.

half_plate.description: A torso armor piece with integrated shoulder pauldrons and arm coverage, providing more protection than a standard breastplate.

half_plate_skirt.description: A torso armor piece with shoulder protection and a skirt panel extending downward for lower body coverage.

full_plate.description: A complete suit of plate armor with full body coverage including helmet and limb protection.

brown_coat.description: A simple brown cloth coat with long sleeves, providing basic torso coverage for casual wear.

brown_robe.description: A simple brown cloth robe with long sleeves providing basic torso coverage for casual wear.

brown_leather_boots.description: Brown leather boots with a sturdy pixelated silhouette, providing basic footwear protection.

armored_boots_brown.description: Brown armored boots with protective metal plating, providing sturdy footwear protection.

brown_gloves.description: Brown cloth or leather gloves providing basic hand coverage and protection.

brown_gauntlets.description: Brown leather gauntlets with protective plating on the knuckles and fingers.

white_car_sedan.description: A white boxy sedan viewed from above with visible windows and body panels.

white_truck.description: A white truck viewed from above with a cargo bed and cabin, rendered in simple pixelated form.

white_truck_no_roof.description: A white truck viewed from above with an open cargo bed and no roof, showing the interior compartment.

white_car_top_2.description: A white boxy sedan viewed from above with visible windows and rectangular body panels.

wheelchair_large.description: A larger wheelchair viewed from above with extended seat area and wider frame structure.

grass_tuft.description: A tall clump of green grass and vegetation rendered as vertical pixelated strands.

shrub_scattered.description: An irregular green shrub or small bush with scattered, blocky pixelated foliage.

vines.description: A tangled mass of green vines with an organic, climbable structure.

trees_angular_pair.description: Two pointed pine or conifer trees with angular branching structure viewed from above.

tree_round_trunk.description: A rounded tree with a prominent tall trunk extending downward.

rock.description: A simple gray stone or rock suitable for terrain.

tree_dead_stark.description: A bare, gnarled dead tree with an irregular jagged silhouette and no foliage.

palm_tree_trunk.description: A palm tree with broad spreading fronds at the top and a slender vertical trunk extending downward.

railroad_ties_squared.description: A burgundy railroad track with evenly-spaced white square ties viewed from above, suitable for railroad or track terrain.

railroad_ties_corner_squared.description: A burgundy railroad track with white square ties forming an L-shaped corner bend viewed from above, suitable for connecting horizontal and vertical track segments.

railroad_ties_t_junction.description: A burgundy railroad track with white square ties forming a T-shaped junction viewed from above.

railroad_ties_cross_junction.description: A burgundy railroad track with white square ties forming a cross-shaped 4-way junction viewed from above.

railroad_ties_dead_end.description: A burgundy railroad track with white square ties forming a dead end where the track terminates.
